𝗔𝗥𝗪𝗘𝗦 | Building futuristic sci-fi themed web applications.  🔥 Super Hot!

┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 📘 TypeScript 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Building futuristic sci-fi themed web applications.
📅 Created: Jan 2015 • Updated: Oct 2025

┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Futuristic Sci-Fi UI components
✅ Animations
✅ Sound effects
✅ Vanilla JavaScript package
✅ React package


┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 7.4K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 323 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 6 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Arwes is a web framework written in TypeScript for building user interfaces with a futuristic sci-fi aesthetic, including designs, animations, and sound effects. It draws inspiration from Cyberprep and productions like Star Citizen and Halo, aiming to inspire advanced science and technology in web development.

┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/arwes/arwes

┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅

🔥 𝗙𝗼𝗹𝗹𝗼𝘄 𝘂𝘀 for daily GitHub projects!

𝗗𝗢𝗖𝗞𝗣𝗘𝗘𝗞 | Easy access and management of Docker container web interfaces across multiple hosts.  🔥 Super Hot!

◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 📜 JavaScript 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Easy access and management of Docker container web interfaces across multiple hosts.
📅 Created: Jun 2025 • Updated: Oct 2025

◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ One-click web access
✅ Automatic port mapping
✅ Live container logs
✅ Traefik integration
✅ Multi-host management
✅ Image update checks


◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 1.4K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 53 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 10 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Dockpeek is a lightweight, self-hosted Docker dashboard that provides quick access to your containers' web interfaces. It simplifies container management by offering features like one-click access, automatic port mapping, live logs, Traefik integration, multi-host management, and image update checks.

◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇◇

𝗩𝗨𝗟𝗡𝗛𝗨𝗡𝗧𝗥 | Automated vulnerability detection in GitHub repositories.  🌟 Rising Fast!

✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🐍 Python 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Automated vulnerability detection in GitHub repositories.
📅 Created: Oct 2024 • Updated: Oct 2025

✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Zero-shot vulnerability discovery using LLMs
✅ Static code analysis
✅ Detection of complex, multi-step vulnerabilities
✅ Support for Python codebases
✅ Identification of LFI, AFO, RCE, XSS, SQLI, SSRF, and IDOR vulnerabilities


✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 2.4K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 272 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 10 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Vulnhuntr is a tool that uses LLMs and static code analysis to automatically discover remotely exploitable vulnerabilities in software. It analyzes code call chains from user input to server output, aiming to detect complex, multi-step security vulnerabilities that traditional static analysis tools may miss.

✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧

• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/protectai/vulnhuntr
